title: TranscriptionResponse
description: Schema for the voice note transcription response

title.description: A short, descriptive title summarizing the note content

description.description: A two-sentence summary of the note's content

transcript.description: The edited transcript in Markdown format, with paragraphs and optional subheadings

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the note was processed

timestamp_readable.description: Human-readable timestamp in the format 'DD Mon YYYY HH:MM'
